instructions: **COMBINED CONTENT INSTRUCTIONS - KNOWLEDGE GRAPH + RENDER + SYNCHRONIZE:**
This instruction combines scenario creation, rendering, and synchronization steps. Execute all steps in sequence.
**Summary:** Add scenarios (happy_path, edge_case, error_case) to each story in story-graph.json. Generate scenario steps using Gherkin format (Given/When/Then).
**Summary:** Update existing story documents with Background and Scenarios sections. Generate story documents in docs/stories/{epic_name}/{sub_epic_name}/{story_name}.md.
**Summary:** Validate that story graph and rendered documents are synchronized. Generate sync report and resolve any discrepancies.
1. Execute STEP 1 (build knowledge graph) - add scenarios to story-graph.json
2. Execute STEP 2 (render documents) - update story documents with scenarios
3. Execute STEP 3 (synchronize) - validate sync between graph and documents
4. Proceed to next action in behavior workflow
